replies.body:
JustTryinM8 has some pretty helpful advice there! Thanks for the assist ^_^! 

Low-Spec mode really only helps with the client itself, so that may not help. I would definitely try the option called "close client during game" though, and be sure that the Game DVR function is *turned **off***. If those don't help, do be sure to check the other steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) M8 linked. 

Hit me back up if those aren't helping and we can dig a little further and figure this out!

I have no idea why, but these things just happen so randomly. And trust me, I understand what it's like..

Anyway, check the support website[ here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Try enabling low-spec mode and have the client turn off during games;

1. Click gear button on top right
2. Enable low-spec mode by checking the box
3. Check the box for the client to be closed during game

(They should be in the general section of the client, if it's not just look around for it)
Beware, it might take longer for the end-game screen to load.

Otherwise, if the _game_ is the problem you could send a[ ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but I recommend you follow the things above before doing so.

We need a patch complaint post for every one having the same issues for you and many more other problems. The game is certaintly broken some minor some huge.
